name: Snowman Defense - Ludum Dare 31 (Theme: "Entire Game on One Screen")
name_original: Snowman Defense - Ludum Dare 31 (Theme: "Entire Game on One Screen")
description:
This prototype is a Ludum Dare game jam project built over the course of a single weekend.

An evil lab has been cooking up a surprise for the local village...LIVING BLOODTHIRSTY SNOWMEN! Defend them with you trusty snowball launcher and see how many you can take down before getting overwhelmed! Resistance is futile.

I focused much more on polish and animation this time around, and I think it shows. This entry still lacks a musical track like my previous entries, just due to my lack of knowledge in that field. However, it is packed with custom-recorded sound effects, slick animations, and nifty particle effects!

This game runs on Unity's Web Player, which may no longer work in your web browser.
